product_name: Finish Line Fiber Grip Carbon Fiber Assembly Gel - 1.75 fl. oz.
long_description: Fiber Grip(TM) Carbon Fiber Assembly gel from Finish Line is specially designed to create friction and reduce slippage between clamped carbon fiber surfaces. Fiber Grip eliminates the need to over tighten clamps to achieve secure connections; over tightening can cause internal fractures and fatigue in carbon fiber parts. Use a thin film when clamping areas of stems, handlebars, seat posts and seat tubes. Clear, non-staining and non-toxic. Inherently biodegradable formulation; 20 - 60% of the product will degrade within 28 days of being exposed to the outside environment. Non-toxic when used in quantities and applications as intended and contains no carcinogenic or Hazardous Air Polluting (HAP) ingredients. Product emits no Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs). Contains no artificial dyes or fragrances, is non-flammable and is packaged in recyclable plastic tubes and tubs.
short_description: Fiber Grip(TM) Carbon Fiber Assembly gel from Finish Line is specially designed to create friction and reduce slippage between clamped carbon fiber surfaces.
